scripts.watch: yarn postinstall && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel index.html --no-hmr --open
scripts.watch-res: yarn postinstall && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel results.html --no-hmr --open
scripts.build: yarn postinstall && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build index.html results.html --no-minify --public-url ./
